= Contrib =

Some django "pluggable" applications have been made compatible with grappelli and others have been specifically created for grappelli. This list some applications that where tested with grappelli (and adapted if needed).


|| *Application* || *Description* ||
|| [http://bitbucket.org/izi/django-admin-tools/ django-admin-tools] || django-admin-tools to give grappelli the possibility to customize admin/index and admin/app_index via admin_tools. bookmarks are back too. ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/django-filebrowser/ django-filebrowser] || The FileBrowser is an extension to the Django Admin-Interface in order to browse directories on your server and upload/delete/edit/rename files, include images/documents to your models/database using the FileBrowseField and select images/documents for TinyMCE and CKEditor.  ||
|| [http://code.google.com/p/django-timepickr/ django-timepickr] || Django form field for haineault's [http://code.google.com/p/django-timepickr/ timepickr] (alpha dev) ||
|| [http://github.com/robhudson/django-debug-toolbar django-debug-toolbar] || The Django Debug Toolbar is a configurable set of panels that display various debug information about the current request/response and when clicked, display more details about the panel's content. ||

You know any other django application that works well with grappelli ? Tell us about it !
